synopsis.text: High school shenanigans and Valentine's Day antics collide in this special edition of "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba." Zenitsu Agatsuma, tired of spending Valentine's Day solo, enlists the help of his buddy Tanjirou Kamado to uncover the secrets of popularity from the esteemed faculty of Kimetsu Academy. From history teacher Kyoujurou Rengoku to PE teacher Giyuu Tomioka and art teacher Tengen Uzui, Zenitsu is willing to follow any advice, no matter how absurd, to ensure a chocolate-filled Valentine's Day. Catch the first three episodes on Aniplex's official YouTube channel, and don't miss the grand finale, which premiered during the Kimetsu Matsuri Online: Anime 2nd Anniversary Festival and is now available on Aniplex's channel. This chibi-style spinoff promises laughter, lessons in love, and a whole new perspective on your favorite Demon Slayer characters.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
